text: Egha atrivim, mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanir mam ko an mɨdorozir gumazir 50pla sara, me amangizɨ, me Elaija inigh izasa zui. Me ghua danganir Elaija itimɨn otivigha gumazir dapanir kam Elaijan garima, a mɨghsɨar mam gisɨn aperaghav iti. Ezɨ gumazir dapanir kam kamaghɨn Elaija mɨgei, “O Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim, atrivim ghaze: Nɨ izighirɨ mangɨ an ganigh.”
